tool_description: Analyzes current and predicted traffic conditions along route segments to estimate delays and optimal departure times.

route_segments.description: Array of route segment identifiers or coordinate pairs

departure_time.description: Planned departure time in ISO 8601 format

analysis_duration_hours.description: How many hours ahead to analyze traffic patterns

day_of_week.description: Day of week for traffic pattern analysis (monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday)

error_messages: Invalid departure time: Provide valid ISO 8601 formatted date-time string.
Invalid day of week: Use full day name in lowercase (monday through sunday).
Too many route segments: Maximum 50 segments allowed for analysis.
Invalid analysis duration: Duration must be between 1 and 72 hours.
Traffic data unavailable: Unable to retrieve traffic information for specified route segments.
usage: Provide route segments, planned departure time, and day of week. Optionally specify analysis duration. Returns traffic predictions and delay estimates for route optimization.

total_delay_minutes.description: Total expected traffic delay in minutes

congestion_segments.description: Route segments expected to have heavy congestion

optimal_departure.description: Recommended departure time to minimize delays

traffic_severity.description: Overall traffic severity level (low, moderate, high, severe)
